en-US.summary: Control your NuVo MusicPort multi-room audio system
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask NuVo to turn on the living room
Alexa, tell NuVo to set master bedroom volume to 50
Alexa, ask NuVo to start party mode
en-US.name: NuVo MusicPort Control
en-US.description: Control your NuVo MusicPort multi-room audio system with voice commands. Turn zones on and off, adjust volume, change sources, and activate party mode.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test with your NuVo MusicPort device connected to the internet.
